### Events
- Updated service-B retry max_attempts from 5 to 4
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Enabled gateway upstream keepalive for geo vendor host
- Scaled service-B from 7 to 9 instances

### On Call
- Shift: R. Alvarez. 8 pages (CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION, SERVICE-B-RETRY-COUNT). 3 tickets (SRV-B-241 retry config, POOL-559, CO-798). Status: Mitigating.
